enhanced_description: ePeople Bespoke Consulting offers specialized Human Capital Management and Business Process consulting services, leveraging a confluent team of experts in HR, business processes, and technology implementation. They are dedicated to delivering convergent, cost-effective, and innovative solutions aimed at transforming HR and business operations through efficient transactional back-office support. Their services, managed via a 24/7 secured web portal, enable management to gain insights into the health of people assets, free HR from transactional pressures to focus on strategic business partnering, and empower managers to effectively oversee their teams and people processes. A key focus area is talent acquisition, specifically supporting clients in hiring top talent faster and more efficiently through services like candidate screening and interview scheduling. They serve clients across varied industry verticals throughout India.
